text: This chapter does not limit or affect the right to serve process in any other manner now or hereafter required or permitted by:
historical:
Prior Codifications

1981 Ed., § 13-331.

1973 Ed., § 13-331.

DC CODE § 13-331

Current through December 11, 2012

sections.text: other law, including Chapter 4 of this title or, any other provisions of this Code; or

heading.catch_text: Service under other laws and rules of court.
